Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan MICroSTREP plus® Panel Cefaclor (0.5 - 8 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic streptococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus® Panel to determine Cefaclor susceptibility in aerobic streptococci using microdilution and instrument read capability
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies grown on solid media of aerobic streptococci, including Streptococcus pneumoniae, specifically for Cefaclor at concentrations of 0.5 to 8 mcg/ml
